title: Introducing: Klo.
content:
Klo.

(Melbourne cousins Chloe Kaul and Simon Lam) cropped up with their intoxicating debut track, Make Me Wonder. Countless blog posts and 75k plays later, the duo return with their second offering, False Calls. Again drawing from R&B influences, whilst sticking to their pop roots, theyâ€™re part Purity Ring, part Ellie Goulding, and perhaps the latest in a growing number of breakthrough musical duos. Check out both tracks below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
